surge: Surge: Immediately Channel mana of the stated Surge amount and element to both of your crystals.
damaged: Damaged: A locale is damaged if its current Strength is less than its original Strength depicted on the card.
clash: Clash: Two locales deal damage to each other equal to their respective Channel values.
freeze: Freeze: Reduce the Channel of a locale to zero until the end of the turn. Any changes in Channel it receives while Frozen will carry over to when it unfreezes.
shielded: Shielded: The next time a locale would receive damage, the damage is prevented and the locale loses Shielded.
dominate: Dominate: A Dominating locale deals damage to the target locale equal to its Channel. Unlike Clash, the receiver does not deal damage back.
nullify: Nullify: Target spell is negated and removed from the spell chain.
drain: Drain: Target locale is dealt damage equal to the Drain amount, with the Draining locale receiving Strength equal to the amount Drained.
illusory: Illusory: After an Illusory locale is destroyed, it returns to the field with 1 Strength and loses Illusory.
rebuild: Rebuild: Return a destroyed locale to the field.
flood: Flood: If the target Flood location is empty or contains a non-Ocean locale, a Calm Ocean locale is placed there. If the target location contains an Ocean already, it gains +1 Channel and +1 Strength.
void: Void: Reduce your opponent's Channeled mana of each element in both crystals by the Void amount. Channeled mana cannot go below zero.
rarity_upgrade: Rarity Upgrade: Increase the Rarity of a locale by 1 level, from Common to Uncommon to Rare to Mythic to Legendary.
consume: Consume: Reduce your Channeled mana for your leading element in both crystals by the Consume amount. Channeled mana cannot go below zero.
restore: Restore: Target locale's Channel and Strength are set equal to its original Channel and Strength depicted on its card.
